sources.title: Skunked Again (1936)
sources.description: Kiko the Kangaroo and Farmer Al Falfa and all the animals take an expedition to the North Pole in a dirigible but the skunks are made to ride in a small- trailer towed by the dirigible...or back of the blimp. Once there they all participate in winter sports. The local walrus lodges a complaint against the visitors. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/skunked-again-1936/

metadata.Plot: Kiko the Kangaroo and Farmer Al Falfa and all the animals take an expedition to the North Pole in a dirigible but the skunks are made to ride in a small- trailer towed by the dirigible...or back of the blimp. Once there they all participate in winter sports. The local walrus lodges a complaint against the visitors.
metadata.Writer: Joseph Barbera, Dan Gordon, Ray Kelley
